Package metrics

Class AbstractMultipleCategoryScore<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
metrics.AbstractMultipleCategoryScore<T>
Type Parameters:
T - a generic type for the class that extends Comparable
All Implemented Interfaces:
MultipleScore<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
F1Score, SensitivityScore, SpecificityScore
public abstract class AbstractMultipleCategoryScore<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MultipleScore<T>
This is an abstract class that implements the MultipleScore interface. It also implements an auxiliary function that can be used (doCalculateScore) that given a ConfusionMatrix and a SingleScore calculates a score for multiple class problems. This method can be used (even though is not enforce) by classes that extends this class
Since:
2020-05-03
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
MultipleScore, SingleScore

  • Method Details

    • doGetScores

      protected abstract java.util.List<java.lang.Double> doGetScores()
      An abstract method to be implemented a posteriori that returns a list of scores for each class and a weighted average in the last element of the list
      Returns:
      List of Double with the score for each class and the weighted average of those scores in the last element

    • doGetLabels

      protected abstract java.util.List<T> doGetLabels()
      An abstract method to be implemented a posteriori that return the labels corresponding to the classes that were used to calculate the scores. This list should contain one less element than the List of scores, as the last score is a weighted average of all scores
      Returns:
      List of Generic type that extends comparable

    • doGetScoreName

      protected abstract java.lang.String doGetScoreName()
      An abstract method to be implemented a posteriori that returns a String with the name of the score that was used for the calculationg (usefull in the toString(), for example).
      Returns:
      A String with the name of the score that was used to calculate the List of scores

    • doCalculateScore

      protected java.util.List<java.lang.Double> doCalculateScore()
      A method that calculates the score for a given number of classes in a confusion matrix received in the parameters. The score is calculated for every class of the matrix using the method getScore() prodivded in the single score class.
      Returns:
      A List of Double with the score for every class and the weighted average of those scores in the last element of the list
      See Also:
      ConcreteConfusionMatrix, SingleScore

    • getScore

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getScore()
      A method that returns a List of Doubles with the scores for the multi-class classification. Internally call the doGetScore abstract method that must be implemented a-posteriori
      Specified by:
      getScore in interface MultipleScore<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
      Returns:
      returns a list of Doubles with the score

    • getLabels

      public java.util.List<T> getLabels()
      A method that return s List of generics (with labels) for the correspoding scores. This list should contain one less element that the list returned by getScore, as getScore returns in the last element a weighted average of the all the scores
      Specified by:
      getLabels in interface MultipleScore<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
      Returns:
      A list of generic type with the labels
